scan_metadata.description: cognito - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check guest access settings
check_functions.description: Ensures guest access to identity pool is disabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check advanced security
check_functions.description: Checks if advanced security is enabled for user pool

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check compromised credentials blocking
check_functions.description: Blocks sign-in attempts with compromised credentials

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check malicious sign-in blocking
Code Executable - API call to check user existence error prevention
check_functions.description: Prevents user existence errors in user pool client

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check token revocation
check_functions.description: Checks if token revocation is enabled for user pool client

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check deletion protection
check_functions.description: Checks if deletion protection is enabled for user pool

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check MFA settings
check_functions.description: Checks if multi-factor authentication is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check password policy for lowercase
check_functions.description: Checks if password policy requires lowercase letters

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check password minimum length
check_functions.description: Checks if password minimum length is 14

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check password policy for numbers
check_functions.description: Checks if password policy requires numbers

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check password policy for symbols
check_functions.description: Checks if password policy requires symbols

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check password policy for uppercase
check_functions.description: Checks if password policy requires uppercase letters

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check self-registration settings
check_functions.description: Ensures self-registration is disabled for user pool

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check temporary password expiration
Code Executable - API call to check WAF ACL attachment
check_functions.description: Checks if WAF ACL is attached to user pool
